mapper.update:
UPDATE cms_template
name = #{name},
status = #{status},
client_type = #{clientType},
client_version_a_id = #{clientVersionAId},
client_version_i_id = #{clientVersionIId},
client_version_a_remark = #{clientVersionARemark},
client_version_i_remark = #{clientVersionIRemark},
client_version_a_code = #{clientVersionACode},
client_version_i_code = #{clientVersionICode},
remark = #{remark},
type = #{type},
show_fgj = #{showFgj},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
